metadata.title: PFA team confiscates Gutka at Multan road

content.article_body: BHAKKAR, Jan 16 (APP):A Punjab Food Authority's (PFA) team here on Thursday confiscated 500 packets of Gutka hazardous to health at Multan road. The spokesman said, an authority's team raided on a tip off at Cold Corner Tuck Shop and confiscated the Gutka. A cased had been registered against the shop's owner in concerned police station, he added.
